name: VAYH
description:
VAYH

Bring back life to dying lands as a spirit of the forest. Turn the whole land green while avoiding the mines. You cannot see the mines but you can feel them as you get closer.

Playable only with the Xbox controller to enjoy haptic functionality
// Left Stick : move around
// A button : drop a totem that will help you remember where you located the mines. 

Global Game Jam download Link :
https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/dress-wild-6

Credits :
Programmers :  Victor Couturieux & Horace Ribout
Sound Designer :  Yana Thesillat
Graphic Artist :  Arnaud Millot & Khal Zero
